sentences.sContent: My fingers were numb and my whole body ached.
He needs to overcome a negative body image (=  what you think about your own body  ) .
sentences.sCn: 他需要克服对自己身体的负面印象。

sentences.sContent: ...it was always known that the body accumulates damage...
...But an accumulating body of research indicates that some distinctions between one type of elder care and another have little real bearing on how well residents do...
...but it also causes you to lose body heat...
...He asks that you pay full attention to how your mind and body interact with computers and how your attention and creativity are influenced by technology...
...Your body didn't evolve to handle this kind of thing...
...The human body is designed to walk...
...a growing body of research has shown that our appetite and food intake are influenced by a large number of factors besides our biological need for energy...
...But there's a growing body of evidence suggesting that today's young adults are also drowning in credit-card debt-and that many of them will take this debt to their graves...
...We know that body language plays an important role in our communication...
...it fails to take into account that the human body continues to fight against weight loss long after dieting has stopped...

synos.tran: 身体；主体；大量；团体；主要部分

phrases.pCn: 主体，主要部分；主船体；机身
身体质量指数；体质指数；体质指数

words.tran: 整体地；亲自地；以肉体形式
赋…以形体；体现（body的过去分词）

trans.tranOther: the physical structure of a person or animal
